name: Marsh Malo - Dodge the Wisps
description:
Marsh Malo - Dodge the Wisps

Malo escapes the bonfire massacre on a gloomy Smore's night...Unfortunately, another kind of fiery threat lurks in the graveyard. 

Beware, you cannot fight, so dodge the Wisps as best as you can!

Thanks for playing 🔥

Huge thanks to my talented friend Thibault Torzuoli, music composer, (@ttorzuoli.music) for making this lovely soundtrack to play along to. ❤️

Post-mortem:

This is my very first gamejam and I did it all on my own (apart from the music). The theme for this Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2023 was "Soft", which made me think of a marshmallow. This was a way to force myself to follow tutorials and learn Godot skills. I'm super proud I managed to finish it, even though there is so much to add and improve.

I created an intro scene but couldn't figure out how to make it work unfortunately.
